definition: Hequ county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi
bend (of a river)/meander
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
variant of 麴|曲[qu1]
yeast/Aspergillus (includes many common molds)/Taiwan pr. [qu2]
surname Qu
bent/crooked/wrong
tune/song/CL:支[zhi1]
Hequ county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

sentences.english: They meander back and forth in a series of curves.
sentences.chinese: 他们河曲回奔波在一系列的曲线。

sentences.english: This meander is slightly different from normal meander.
sentences.chinese: 这个河曲形态和常见的简单河曲略有不同。

sentences.english: This meander is slightly different from normal meander.
sentences.chinese: 这个河曲形态和常见的简单河曲略有不同。

sentences.english: The river forms new meanders that curve along the valley floor.
sentences.chinese: 河流形成新的河曲，在谷底逶迤流淌。

sentences.english: 《Zou Xi Kou》is one of its representative works.
sentences.chinese: 河曲二人台的代表作是《走西口》。

sentences.english: Hequ Horse is one of the China's three major names.
sentences.chinese: 河曲马是中国三大名马之一。

sentences.english: The river forms broad loops, called meanders.
sentences.chinese: 河流形成宽阔的河弯，称之为河曲。

sentences.english: Neither the upper bend of the don, nor the crucial land bridge, had been secured .
sentences.chinese: 上游的顿河河曲和关系重大的陆口桥梁此时都未到手。

sentences.english: Results showed that the desertification control efficiency mainly shows a tendency to rise in the whole county.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，河曲县的荒漠化防治效益以上升趋势为主。

sentences.english: By the crook the cook looked through a cookbook before making hooked cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在河曲边，厨子在做钩形饼干之前查阅了一本食谱。
